text: Donse donna malanna xii soloferedeni, Manga Asuyerusu to sɛwa dɔlɔn na, a yi a xɛmɛ tɛgɛnxi1.10 Xɛmɛ tɛgɛnna: Na waxatini, mangane yi xɛmɛna ndee tɛgɛnma nɛn alogo e xa e yengi dɔxɔ mangana feene xɔn, e mi bira mangana ɲaxanle fɔxɔ ra.  solofereni itoe xili: Mɛhuman, Bisita, Harabona, Bigita, Abagita, Sɛtara, e nun Karakasi.
